titles.title: To amend section 105(a)(8) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to increase the percentage limitation on the amount of community development block grant assistance that may be expended for public services activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 10/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to increase from 15 percent to 20 percent the limitation on the amount of community development block grant assistance that may be expended for public services activities.
